attributes.contentHtml:
yeah keep talking xD. You're literally an 11 year old who knows nothing. You are so scared you even use alt accounts lmfao. (Bluey and GoldenOreo are his accounts).

  1. Used Money to gain trust with his friends (gave Nitro)
    I earned their trust before that shit too. I gave nitro because I want to be generous, open minded and nice?

  2. Betraying
    When did I every betray anyone xD? I can't even lmfao this is so funny.

  3. Swearing
    Literally everyone swears on Discord. You can't even deny that shit.

  4. Threating (Threatening)
    You really thought I was gonna get you on the bin? lmao, you're so gullible.

This is honestly so funny how you can talk shit even though you lie, you are gullible, think swearing is the worst thing ever, you thought I betrayed and you thought I used money to gain trust. Keep in mind you are the 11 year old on Discord who doesn't know anything and you rely on people to do stuff for you. You say I'm "childish" and "idiotic" when I have reasons to be both of those traits you say I am. You literally can't back yourself up with a couple of screenshots no one will even care about. nice try though.

attributes.title: Truth About Maple#9111 | 2nd Post Abt Maple

attributes.contentHtml: Maple The funny thing is that afterwards you try to say that you are not toxic
Maple I am not even using alt, I know that Golden Oreo Acc is mine, I stopped using it, it isn't my main acc now, I use this acc for main.
Maple You only swear to people u hate, u don't swear to people that u like or ur server members
